005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter;
007
008import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.jsonFormatVisitors.JsonFormatTypes;
009
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.AbstractDataTypeAdapter;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IBase64BinaryItem;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
014
015import java.nio.ByteBuffer;
016import java.util.Base64;
017import java.util.List;
018
019import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
020
021import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
022
023public class Base64Adapter
024    extends AbstractDataTypeAdapter<ByteBuffer, IBase64BinaryItem> {
025  @NonNull
026  private static final List<QName> NAMES = ObjectUtils.notNull(
027      List.of(
028          new QName(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH.toASCIIString(), "base64"),
029          // for backwards compatibility with original type name
030          new QName(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH.toASCIIString(), "base64Binary")));
031
032  Base64Adapter() {
033    super(ByteBuffer.class);
034  }
035
036  @Override
037  public List<QName> getNames() {
038    return NAMES;
039  }
040
041  @Override
042  public JsonFormatTypes getJsonRawType() {
043    return JsonFormatTypes.STRING;
044  }
045
046  @SuppressWarnings("null")
047  @Override
048  public ByteBuffer parse(String value) {
049    Base64.Decoder decoder = Base64.getDecoder();
050    byte[] result = decoder.decode(value);
051    return ByteBuffer.wrap(result);
052  }
053
054  @Override
055  public ByteBuffer copy(Object obj) {
056    ByteBuffer buffer = (ByteBuffer) obj;
057    final ByteBuffer clone
058        = buffer.isDirect() ? ByteBuffer.allocateDirect(buffer.capacity()) : ByteBuffer.allocate(buffer.capacity());
059    final ByteBuffer readOnlyCopy = buffer.asReadOnlyBuffer();
060    readOnlyCopy.flip();
061    clone.put(readOnlyCopy);
062    return clone;
063  }
064
065  @SuppressWarnings("null")
066  @Override
067  public String asString(Object value) {
068    Base64.Encoder encoder = Base64.getEncoder();
069    return encoder.encodeToString(((ByteBuffer) value).array());
070  }
071
072  @Override
073  public Class<IBase64BinaryItem> getItemClass() {
074    return IBase64BinaryItem.class;
075  }
076
077  @Override
078  public IBase64BinaryItem newItem(Object value) {
079    ByteBuffer item = toValue(value);
080    return IBase64BinaryItem.valueOf(item);
081  }
082
083}
